heroDesc: Beijing Institute of Technology Formula Student Electric Team
addressLine2: Engineering Training Center, BIT Liangxiang Campus
aboutHistoryDesc: BIT FSAE Racing Team (BITFSAE) was founded in 2009, making it one of earliest Formula Student teams in China.
aboutMissionDesc: Our mission is to cultivate exceptional talents with innovative spirit and engineering practice capabilities.
scanWeChat: Scan to follow us for latest updates
newsPageSubtitle: Explore the exciting moments and stories of BITFSAE

newsSeoDescription: Explore the latest BITFSAE updates, race records, and team stories.

eventIntro1: Formula SAE/Formula Student is a comprehensive engineering education competition for university students, initiated by SAE in 1979 and held worldwide.
eventIntro2: China started preparing its Formula Student program in 2008, later forming Formula Student China (FSC).
eventNatureDesc: FSC asks student teams to independently design, build, and tune a single-seat race car in about one year, while evaluating engineering, management, cost, and collaboration capabilities.
eventFsccDesc: Launched in 2010 by SAE-China with partner universities, it is the foundation of the series.
eventFsecDesc: First held in 2015 in Shanghai, promoting innovation in electric race car technologies.
eventFsacDesc: First launched in 2017, focusing on autonomous formula technologies.
eventBscDesc: Focused on off-road vehicle engineering and performance.
eventVision1: FSC promotes the vision of fostering future automotive engineering talents in China.
eventVision2: Through systematic training, it improves students' capabilities in design, manufacturing, cost, business, and teamwork.
